meanings.sent1: The newsier story captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The newscaster reported on the newsier events of the day.
meanings.sent3: The newsier headline made me stop in my tracks.
meanings.sent4: Her newsier approach to reporting brought in more viewers.
meanings.sent5: The newsier details painted a vivid picture of the event.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is more up-to-date or current
meanings.sent1: She checked the newsier websites for the latest updates.
meanings.sent2: The journalist always strives to report newsier.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer's style is always newsier than the rest.
meanings.sent4: The technology company constantly works to stay newsier.
meanings.sent5: The weather forecast became newsier as the storm approached.

meanings.definition: Having the quality of being more informative or interesting than before
meanings.sent1: The newsier article provided valuable insights.
meanings.sent2: Her presentation was much newsier than the previous one.
meanings.sent3: The newsier documentary kept the audience engaged throughout.
meanings.sent4: The newsier podcast had listeners eagerly awaiting each episode.
meanings.sent5: The newsier report shed light on the issue in a compelling way.
